original_text:
What will you say when they set as head over you
    those whom you yourself have taught to be friends to you?
Will not pangs take hold of you
    like those of a woman in labor?
korean_text: 너의 친구 삼았던 자를 그가 네 위에 우두머리로 세우실 때에 네가 무슨 말을 하겠느냐 네가 고통에 사로잡힘이 산고를 겪는 여인 같지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: when they set as head over you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신 위에 머리로 세울 때

sentences.original_text: those whom you yourself have taught
Will not pangs take hold of you
like those of a woman in labor?
